code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{persistStore}from'redux-persist';import logger from'redux-logger';import rootReducer from'./root-reducer';import rootSaga from'./root-saga';import createSagaMiddleware from'@redux-saga/core';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var middlwares=[sagaMiddleware];if(process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'){middlwares.push(logger);}export var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlwares));sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export var persistor=persistStore(store);
